awd_titl_txt: Engineering Research Equipment Grant:  Microcomputer Based  Image Processing and Geographic Information System
awd_abstract_narration: This award is for the purchase of a Microcomputer Based Image                   Processing and Geographic Information System by the Department of               Civil and Environmental Engineering, New Jersey Institute of                    Technology.  This system will be used in research as well as in                 teaching.  It will upgrade the present system by which                          interpretation of aerial and satellite is now done visually, and                improve ongoing and future research on analysis of natural                      resources and land evaluation.  The capabilities of professional                staff and students will also benefit by having available this                   digital image processing instrumentation.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation

inst.inst_street_address: 323 DR MARTIN LUTHER KING JR BLVD
